[StreetDirtRoadIntersectionSolutions]
; transition straight road into straight street
RWSE=0x00020000,0x00000002,0x5700F000,1,0
RNSS=0x02000000,0x00000200,0x5700F000,2,0
RESW=0x00000002,0x00020000,0x5700F000,3,0
RSSN=0x00000200,0x02000000,0x5700F000,0,0
; transition straight road into end street
RESN=0x00000200,0x00020000,0x5700F300,0,0
RSSE=0X00020000,0X02000000,0x5700F300,1,0
RWSS=0X02000000,0X00000002,0x5700F300,2,0
RNSW=0X00000002,0X00000200,0x5700F300,3,0
RWSN=0X00000200,0X00000002,0x5700F300,0,1
RNSE=0X00020000,0X00000200,0x5700F300,3,1
RESS=0X02000000,0X00020000,0x5700F300,2,1
RSSW=0X00000002,0X02000000,0x5700F300,1,1
; transition straight road into corner street
RESWN=0X00000202,0X00020000,0x5760C500,3,0
RSSNE=0X00020200,0X02000000,0x5760C500,0,0
RWSES=0X02020000,0X00000002,0x5760C500,1,0
RNSWS=0X02000002,0X00000200,0x5760C500,2,0
RWSNE=0X00020200,0X00000002,0x5760C500,3,1
RSSWN=0X00000202,0X02000000,0x5760C500,0,1
RESSW=0X02000002,0X00020000,0x5760C500,1,1
RNSES=0X02020000,0X00000200,0x5760C500,2,1
; transition straight road into middle street
RESNS=0X02000200,0X00020000,0x57601000,0,0
RSSEW=0X00020002,0X02000000,0x57601000,1,0
RWSNS=0X02000200,0X00000002,0x57601000,2,0
RNSEW=0X00020002,0X00000200,0x57601000,3,0
; transition straight road into t-intersection street
RESSNW=0X02000202,0X00020000,0x5760B100,0,0
RSSENW=0X00020202,0X02000000,0x5760B100,1,0
RWSSEN=0X02020200,0X00000002,0x5760B100,2,0
RNSSEW=0X02020002,0X00000200,0x5760B100,3,0
; transition straight road into no exit street

;RES0=0X00000000,0X00020000,0x5700F000,1,0
;RNS0=0X00000000,0X00000200,0x5700F000,0,0
;RWS0=0X00000000,0X00000002,0x5700F000,3,0
; transition corner road into straight street

; transition straight road into straight street (4-way)
